issues.title: E-002 DB: Library tables + RLS (styles/environments)
issues.body:
## Ziel
Persistente Library f端r Styles & Environments inkl. Owner-only Zugriff (RLS).

## Scope
- Tabellen: styles, environments (id, workspace_id/user_id, name, tags[], json, updated_at)
- RLS Policies: Owner-only CRUD
- Indexe f端r Search/Filter (optional)

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given user A created a style When user B tries to read/update/delete Then access is denied
- Given valid style payload When insert Then record is stored and returned

issues.title: E-002 FE: Library list views (styles/environments) + states
issues.body:
## Ziel
Library UI: Listenansicht f端r Styles/Environments mit Loading/Empty/Error States.

## Scope
- Styles tab + Environments tab
- Loading/Empty/Error
- Basic actions: open item / create button

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given no items When user opens library Then empty state is shown with CTA
- Given items exist When user opens library Then list renders with name + tags

issues.title: E-002 FE: Create/Edit/Delete forms for library items
issues.body:
## Ziel
Create/Edit/Delete f端r Style/Environment Items (Supabase persistiert).

## Scope
- Form: name + tags + JSON editor (textarea ok) + validation hint
- Delete confirm
- Optimistic update optional

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given user fills valid form When save Then item appears in list and persists after reload
- Given user deletes item When confirm Then item disappears and is not injectable

issues.title: E-002 FE: Tagging + filter + search + sort
issues.body:
## Ziel
Items schnell finden: Tags, Filter, Search, Sort.

## Scope
- Tag input (multi) + suggestions (optional)
- Filter by tags
- Search by name (partial match)
- Sort: updated desc / alpha

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given items with tags When filter by tag Then only matching items shown
- Given search query When typing Then results update with partial matches

issues.title: E-002 BE: Injection helpers + merge conflict detection
issues.body:
## Ziel
Bricks injizieren: style/env subtree merge + konfliktliste.

## Scope
- inject_style(basePrompt, styleBrick)
- inject_environment(basePrompt, envBrick)
- conflict report: [{ path, current, incoming }]
- merge policy: user chooses per conflict (no silent overwrite)

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given basePrompt and incoming brick with overlap When merge Then conflicts list contains overlapping paths
- Given no overlaps When merge Then merged basePrompt contains incoming fields

issues.title: E-002 FE: Mix & Match UI (inject + conflict resolution)
issues.body:
## Ziel
1-click inject + konfliktauswahl UI.

## Scope
- Inject buttons on library items
- Conflict modal/list: Keep current vs Use brick
- Apply selection updates basePrompt

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given conflicts exist When injecting Then conflict UI appears
- Given user chooses resolutions When apply Then basePrompt reflects chosen values

issues.title: E-002 FE: Merge preview (diff) + undo
issues.body:
## Ziel
Merge transparenter machen: diff preview + undo snapshot.

## Scope
- Diff view (added/changed) for merged fields
- Undo returns previous basePrompt state (session)

## AC (Gherkin)
- Given merge happened When user opens preview Then changed/added fields are highlighted
- Given user clicks undo When executed Then basePrompt returns to pre-merge state
